description: ATTO-488TM TGase Protein K-Labeling Kit is intended for MTG mediated labeling of proteins (> 5 kDa) with ATTO-488TM dye. The reagents in the kit are sufficient for labeling of 1 mg protein, either 1 x 1 mg, 2 x 500 μg or 4 x 250 μg protein per labeling reaction.
name: ATTO-488TM TGase Protein K-Labeling Kit
